name: You better save the Internet!
description:
This is my entry for Ludum Dare #48 - Deeper and Deeper

-----

Something happened to the Submarine communications cable... So that means no Internet... and a lot of angry people! 

Your mission is to find the damages in the cables and fix them!

---

Controls

So far this game works only with keyboard. (Left and right arrows and the space bar to shoot).

---

I hope you have fun playing my game!

I created all the drawings using Inkscape and used the Godot Game Engine. The music  is by SubspaceAudio.
